main(String[]) - Static method in class com.hfych2.brickdestroy.Main
 
Main - Class in com.hfych2.brickdestroy
This class was the GraphicsMain class of the original code and renamed to Main to provide easier understanding of the current code.
The class that contains the main method that calls the initialise() using the EventQueue.invokeLater(Runnable).

makeChessboardLevel(Rectangle, int, int, double, int, int) - Method in class com.hfych2.brickdestroy.model.Levels

makeCrack(Point, Point) - Method in class com.hfych2.brickdestroy.model.Crack
Makes the crack.
Use Path2D.Float.moveTo(double, double) to the point of impact.
The bound is the Crack.crackDepth.
Calls Crack.inMiddle(int, int, int) to check for each Crack.steps and if Crack.inMiddle(int, int, int) returns true then assign Crack.jumps(int, double) value to the second parameter of Path2D.Float.lineTo(double, double)
makeLevels(Rectangle, int, int, double) - Method in class com.hfych2.brickdestroy.model.Levels
Makes the levels by calling either Levels.makeSingleTypeLevel(Rectangle, int, int, double, int) or Levels.makeChessboardLevel(Rectangle, int, int, double, int, int) and passing in the respective arguments.
